select board_no ,board_title ,board_content ,member_id ,board_indate ,board_view ,board_like ,lat ,lon ,originalfile ,savedfile ,like_check from balloon_tb
where board_indate >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') >= board_indate
where board_indate >= sysdate-3/(24)

select * from( select board_no ,board_title ,board_content ,member_id ,board_indate ,board_view ,board_like ,lat ,lon ,originalfile ,savedfile ,like_check from balloon_tb order by board_view desc ) where rownum < =10
